optOut.waitForThenClick: body > div#privacy-settings-background > div#privacy-settings > div:nth-child(3):not([id]) > div:nth-child(2):not([id]) > a:not([id])

test.waitForVisible: body > div#privacy-settings-background > div#privacy-settings > div:nth-child(3):not([id]) > div:nth-child(2):not([id]) > a:not([id])
